titles: Some modest reflections upon Mr. Stephens's late book, entituled, A plain relation of the late action at sea, between the English, Dutch, and French fleets, from June 22 to July 5 last with reflections thereupon, and upon the present state of the nation, &c. : with a vindication of the Church of England from what he has therein advanc'd against her / by a hearty lover of King William and Queen Mary.
author: Hearty lover of King William and Queen Mary.
publisher: Printed and sold by Randall Taylor ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Stephens, Edward, d. 1706. --  Plain relation of the late action at sea.
